FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of buffers allowed for a specific queue. The value is given in bytes or kilobytes and overrides the default value for the context.

ParaDef.Info: The size parameter is required when specifying mbs and is expressed as an integer representing the required size in either bytes or kilobytes. ParamDefault: Default- kilobyte
Sets the MBS to its default value.
Specifies that the value given for size is interpreted as the queue s MBS value given in bytes. Values-0 to 2688000.
Specifies the value is interpreted as the queue s MBS value given in kilobytes. Values-0 to 2625. ParamDefault: Default- kilobytes
